usefulItems: square cake tin (20 cm), baking paper, cocktail stick, oven
title: Banana Blondies

ingredients.content: 120 g white chocolate, small chips or callets

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line base and sides of a square cake tin (20 cm) with baking paper.
Place brazil nuts in mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place butter and sugar in mixing bowl then melt <b>3 min/60°C/speed 2<b>.
Add flour, bananas, egg, vanilla extract and salt then mix <b>15 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then mix again <b>15 sec/speed 4<b>.

Add chocolate chips and reserved chopped nuts then mix <b>10 sec//speed 3<b>. Transfer to prepared tin and bake for 20-25 minutes (180°C) until a cocktail stick inserted in centre comes out relatively clean.
Leave to cool in tin before removing. Cut into 12 squares to serve.
